title: Observer status for the International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/C.6/80/L.3 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16080 (E)    141025 
*2516080* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Sixth Committee 
Agenda item 171 
Observer status for the International Centre for Integrated 
Mountain Development in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
 
Afghanistan, Bhutan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Nepal and Pakistan: 
draft resolution 
 
 
 
 Observer status for the International Centre for Integrated 
Mountain Development in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the 
International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the International Centre for Integrated Mountain 
Development to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in 
the capacity of observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution.

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
